name: com.brightlib.fsms
description: Different FSM designs to control characters, menus and game flow.

samples.description: Simple FSM that demonstrates transitions between two states: ON and OFF.
HierarchicalFSM that demonstrates how to create a state with sub states to reduce transitions.
PushdownFSM that demonstrates how to push and pop states to preserve history.
Complex FSM with generic type FSM<Actor> demonstrating how to separate state from behaviour.
